author: pier
msg: The Xerces implementation of the classes specified by Java JSR 5 (Java Api for XML Parsing).

author: pier
msg: The javax.xml.parsers package as specified by the "Java API for XML Parsers".
This is not (C) Apache, because, since it's a javax package implementation,
if something arises, I don't want the ASF to be blamed for it.
